Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Allows prospective tenants of rent controlled or rent stabilized housing accommodations to request the complete rent history of such housing accommodations
Summary: Allows prospective tenants of rent controlled or rent stabilized housing accommodations to request the complete rent history of such housing accommodations.
LawCode: Amd ยง14, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to allowing prospective tenants of rent controlled or rent stabilized housing accommodations to request the complete rent history of such housing accommodations
